features: Suricata/Snort-style IPS categories (malware, exploits, dos, policy-violation, suspicious, web-attacks, reconnaissance, botnet)
Global IPS configuration with home/external/excluded networks
Custom IPS rule management with priority
Alert history with filtering by category, severity, source/destination IP
KV-based storage for config and category settings
D1-based storage for custom rules and alerts
notes: Config stored in KV namespace CONFIGS with key pattern: ips_config:{userId}, ips_categories:{userId}
Custom rules stored in D1 table: ips_rules
Alerts stored in D1 table: ips_alerts
All endpoints protected with Clerk authentication
Alert list supports pagination with max limit of 500
